sentences.en: Almost every passage contains some reference to the fate awaiting men in the afterlife.
sentences.cn: 几乎每个段落都是提及人类死后等待的命运.

sentences.en: Do you believe in an afterlife?
Do you believe in any kind of afterlife?
sentences.cn: 你相信有任何种类的来生 吗 .

sentences.en: God said that the cause afterlife Sansheng carved in stone on top.
sentences.cn: 神说来世的因缘刻在三生石之上.

sentences.en: How are God and the afterlife different?
sentences.cn: 上帝和来世的生活有什麽不同的?

sentences.en: I very difficult to forget, let me forget it until you afterlife.
sentences.cn: 忘了我好难, 让我忘了你那就等到来世.

sentences.en: If there is afterlife, I am still your beautiful bride.
sentences.cn: 如果有来世, 我依旧是你最美的新娘.

sentences.en: It is incredible to me that there should be an afterlife.
sentences.cn: 我无法相信有来世这回事.

sentences.en: Juba: Your family. In the afterlife.
sentences.cn: 朱巴: 你的家人, 在阴间.

sentences.en: Life is only once, we cannot sure there is an afterlife.
sentences.cn: 生命只有一次, 我们根本无法确定有来生.

sentences.en: Many scholars regarded it as the counterpart of Walter Benjamins afterlife.
sentences.cn: 多数学者把它等同于沃尔特·本雅明的“以后生存”.

sentences.en: People of many religions believe in an afterlife.
sentences.cn: 很多宗教的信徒都相信来生.

sentences.en: So believe it or not, I'd rather there afterlife.
sentences.cn: 为此,信也好,不信也好, 我宁愿有来世.

sentences.en: So believe it or not, I'd rather there were afterlife.
sentences.cn: 为此,信也好,不信也好, 我宁愿有来世!

sentences.en: We are doing the afterlife and sisters, remember!
sentences.cn: 我们来世在做姐妹, 记住了!

trans.tran_en: the life that some people believe people have after death
